
# Combination of the Modules {#sec-combination}

<!-- add DAB, check each combination, check links -->



This chapter shows the possible combination of modules for different topologies. Each topology is linked to the wikipedia page of the converter. The Table can be read as follow:

- The modules for each converter are in correct order from left to right
- Each module has the designator of the connected solderbridges attached
- Abbreviations in the table:
    - In = Input Module
    - Sw = Switching Module
    - P = Passive Module
    - T = Transformer Module
- An Output Module is added at the end of each topology
